title: Gilbert & Sullivan's the Yeomen of the Guard
brief_description: Described as Gilbert and Sullivan’s most romantic opera and subtitled The merryman and his maid, the story tells of the love of Elsie Maynard, daughter of the Sergeant of the Guard at the Tower of London for the dashing Colonel Fairfax, falsely accused of treason and soon to be executed on Tower Green. Performers include: Joel Grey, Alfred Marks, Elizabeth Gale, David Hillman, Elizabeth Bainbridge. The London Symphony Orchestra (London) conducted by Alexander Faris. John McCarthy (Chorus Master), Ambrosian Opera Chorus. Staged by Anthony Besch. Introduced by Douglas Fairbanks Jnr.
